author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Berkshire Hathaway More Than Doubles Share Stake In Teva
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Berkshire Hathaway:
* UPS SHARE STAKE IN APPLE TO 239.6 MILLION SHARES FROM 165.3 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* MORE THAN DOUBLES SHARE STAKE IN TEVA TO 40.5 MILLION SPONSORED ADRS - SEC FILING
* CUTS SHARE STAKE IN VERISK ANALYTICS BY 81.8 PERCENT TO 284,778 CLASS A SHARES - SEC FILING
* CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source for quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: ( bit.ly/2rJ2Yh7 ) Source for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2nZHhYc )
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
